data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Aguas Buenas.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aguas Buenas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who are far from you in Aguas Buenas. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 16,805 people in Aguas Buenas who are far from you. Please add 4 new house churches this year.
Father, encourage the 8,096 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Aguas Buenas, Puerto Rico know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Aguas Buenas, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Aguas Buenas.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
